item.title: Logistic Regression in R
item.description: # Load require library library(ISLR) library(plyr) library(tidyverse) # data manipulation and visualization library(modelr) # provides easy pipeline modeling functions library(broom) # helps to tidy up model outputs library(ROCR) # ROC curve and AUC Read in Data # Load data (default <- as_tibble(ISLR::Default)) ## # A tibble: 10,000 x 4 ## default student balance income ## <fct> <fct> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 No No 730. 44362. ## 2 No Yes 817.

item.title: Plot with Error Bar
item.description: Introduction This tutorial describes how to create a graph with error bars using R software and ggplot2 package. There are different types of error bars which can be created using the functions below : geom_errorbar(), geom_linerange(), geom_pointrange(), geom_crossbar(), geom_errorbarh() Prepare the data ToothGrowth data is used. It describes the effect of Vitamin C on tooth growth in Guinea pigs. Three dose levels of Vitamin C (0.5, 1, and 2 mg) with each of two delivery methods [orange juice (OJ) or ascorbic acid (VC)] are used :
